General.Name: IFCA MSC Bhd
General.Description: IFCA MSC Berhad, a business software solution company, engages in the research and development of enterprise-wide business solutions in Malaysia and internationally. It operates in three segments: Software Applications and Royalty Income; Hardware, Networking and Operating Systems; and Maintenance, Support System, Training and Implementation Services. The company offers PropertyX, a cloud-based property management system solution for developers, agencies, solicitors, bankers, and purchasers; and ContractX, a construction software that manages a project from start to finish in a single place. It also provides HotelX that provides mobile internet hotel management solution; and HRX, a cloud-based human resource information system that enables employees to manage various HR-related business functions. In addition, the company is involved in the provision of turnkey solutions, as well as the installation and servicing of computer hardware and networks. It offers its software solutions for property, construction, and hospitality industries; and human resource management. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
